# Do not edit this file! It has been generated by the libs/create_module_skeleton.py script.

include(Einsums_Message)

# cmake-format: off
set(_Einsums_modules
  Assertion
  BLAS
  BLASBase
  BLASVendor
  Benchmark
  Concepts
  Config
  Debugging
  Decomposition
  DesignPatterns
  Errors
  FFT
  GPUStreams
  HPTT
  Iterator
  LinearAlgebra
  Logging
  Preprocessor
  Print
  Profile
  Runtime
  RuntimeConfiguration
  StringUtil
  Tensor
  TensorAlgebra
  TensorBase
  TensorUtilities
  TypeSupport
  Utilities
  )
# cmake-format: on

einsums_info("")
einsums_info("  Configuring Einsums modules:")

foreach(module ${_Einsums_modules})
  einsums_info("    ${module}")
  add_subdirectory(${module})
endforeach()
